desc.p: Fields FROM.CURRENCY to form a related multi value set. Standard T24 currency field.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 3 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the CURRENCY file.

Fields TXN.REF.COMPANY to REPL.VALUE form a related multi value set.
Specifies the Bank's Profit/Loss for the transaction, in case of sub-product Limits where the Core routine FX.LIMIT.NETTING.I is used to calculate the Limit outstanding.
